Advance 4T Long Ride 10W-40 (SN/MA2) Malaysia EN 140001435555 EHS V1.1 08-SEP-2020

marketing: The 100% synthetic Shell Advance 4T Long Ride is made from this pure and clear base oil, combined with a motorcycle-specific additive pack with unique Active Cleansing Technology. It helps to cleanse and keep the engine cleaner. A clean motorcycle engine helps provide better engine efficiency, performance and protection.
